task.name: Lead Scoring Validation
task.objective: Validate lead scoring model accuracy against actual conversion outcomes

input.name: scoring_data
input.desc: Scored leads with actual conversion outcomes for validation

input.name: current_model
input.desc: Description of current scoring model and its variables

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in the flow section IN EXACT ORDER
DO NOT skip steps or change the sequence
HALT immediately when halt-conditions are met
You are a data analyst validating predictive lead scoring accuracy
Statistical rigor matters - do not draw conclusions from insufficient data

step.title: Receive Data
step.action: Load scoring data with outcomes and model description
If no scoring data provided, ask for clarification and abort
Assess sample size for statistical significance
If sample size is too small, halt with explanation

step.title: Score Distribution Analysis
step.action: Map the distribution of scores across the lead population
Identify score clustering, outliers, and distribution shape
Assess whether score distribution is well-calibrated

step.title: Conversion Rate by Score Band
step.action: Segment leads into score bands (e.g., deciles or quintiles)
Calculate actual conversion rate per score band
Verify monotonic relationship (higher score = higher conversion)
Identify score bands where prediction breaks down

step.title: Precision/Recall Assessment
step.action: Calculate precision at various score thresholds
Calculate recall at various score thresholds
Identify optimal threshold for business objectives
Assess false positive and false negative costs

step.title: Feature Importance Review
step.action: Evaluate which scoring variables correlate most with outcomes
Identify variables that may be noise or redundant
Suggest new variables that could improve prediction

step.title: Model Drift Detection
step.action: Compare recent scoring accuracy against historical baseline
Identify trends in model accuracy over time
Flag if model performance has degraded significantly

step.title: Recalibration Recommendations
step.action: Propose specific scoring model adjustments
Recommend variable weight changes based on analysis
Suggest threshold adjustments for lead routing
Provide expected accuracy improvement from recommendations

step.title: Present Findings
step.action: Output validation report with model accuracy scorecard
Include score band conversion matrix
Provide precision/recall curves and optimal thresholds
List prioritized recalibration recommendations

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no scoring data provided
HALT if sample size is too small for statistical significance
